I have ordered multiple phones from Gazelle. The phones received have been as ordered and work fine. The problem starts when you open your box and find they have sent you the wrong phone.  You have to get a return authorization, sent it back and wait for the refund.  You have to enter a new order for a phone.  They will send you a lot of emails and customer service will answer your calls and emails but are of no help.  If you need a phone now , tough luck.

Website is easy to use and had such fast delivery. I ordered over the veterans day weekend and received my phone on Monday. I was impressed to say the least, and the phone I got is in great quality.Edit: 11/15Had an issue with set up and transfer. Essentially the phone I bought was not in actuality compatible with the carrier it was labeled with. Calling customer service recommended I return the current device and purchase another, but this experience definitely has me shying away from trying again, especially when there are other avenues for refurbished tech.

I liked the easy process, the fast shipping, the available choices and the reasonable prices. I however got a “fair” iPhone 11 that has a bad loud speaker. When I play YouTube for example, the speaker is broken and doesn’t work well.

Review.Titre: I did not receive the phone I ordered
Review.Contenu: I did not receive the phone I ordered. To make it worst it was locked to a carrier I don't use. The return process was pretty easy, but I would have like to have gotten what I asked for. I have used Gazelle in the past with success.

Review.Titre: I was happy overall with the…entire experience.
Review.Contenu: I was happy overall with the transaction, but before it shipped, I had called to see if I could change the color of the phone from Graphite to Pacific Blue. I was told I was not able to do it at that time, but when I received it, I was to do an exchange. I tried to do an exchange and could not figure it out. I sent a "contact us" message immediately when I received it but have not received an answer. I did not open the package as it is a gift, but I would like to change the color before I give it.

Phone came quickly and was delivered/packed well. However, we have had nothing but issues trying to transfer information from the old iPhone (SE, 2nd edition) to the new one just purchased. We have been trying since it was delivered Thursday, and still have had no success.

Review.Titre: We’ve ordered two other iPad airs from…
Review.Contenu: We’ve ordered two other iPad airs from gazelle that work great. This one seems okay but the home button sticks which does feel a bit off.

Review.Titre: The quality of the phone was good
Review.Contenu: The quality of the phone was good, however it takes time to receive it, the only I have was after I received my phone the price went down and I called in order to price match with new price the didn’t accept to do it and it’s very disappointing for they are not flexible to deal with my issue.

I already did a review but.. Im happy with the quality of the phone I received. So far everything is working. My rating is due to not receiving a new battery with this device. Battery quality is at 81%. I will need to take it in for a new one very soon with a new cost and inconvenience. I’ve purchased similar phones on e-bay that come with 100% battery that I bought a year ago and it’s still at 99%. Definitely will go that route next time.

When logging in, I was not seeing my ID and password as I typed. That is confusing. I had to place two orders, the first was cancelled, although the items were shown as available when I ordered. I made several attempts to call and was never connected. The second order was fulfilled after I received a delay email.

Review.Titre: Received Fair Phone When I Paid For Good
Review.Contenu: The phone I received was in fair condition when I paid for a phone in good conditon... like $50 more. It works fine, but is pretty scuffed on the sides and back.

Review.Titre: Did not receive the correct connection…
Review.Contenu: Did not receive the correct connection cord. The case# C02725671 has been 'in review" for more than a week.The unit received is very good, as expected.
Great price. Great phone. Ordered 11-22-23 and is still showing not shipped. However, I have it. And it was late even though I paid for express shipping.

Review.Titre: I ordered 2 phones that were supposed…
Review.Contenu: I ordered 2 phones that were supposed to be 2 different colors. They both came in the same color. Then 1 was bent and the other was an old cooperate phone so I couldn't download the apps I needed and had to mail it back.

Review.Titre: Exchange or return requested, no response
Review.Contenu: Update: Gazelle has since replied with a return option that is satisfactory.  I am unsure why my first request was not acknowledged, however, this has since been remedied. For this, I am improving my rating to three stars.Original review: I have contacted your company that the phone came in with a broken speaker. I can not hear when I am on speaker phone. The sound is too low. The phone is scratched on the screen and has gunk in all the crevices. I contacted your company for an exchange but have not received a message back to my knowledge

Review.Titre: Odering and Shipping Great. QA might need some work.
Review.Contenu: Gazelle does a nice job with logistics, but could use some refinement with QA. Recently I had purchased a replacement phone for my daughter. The first phone came and was in great cosmetic condition. However, the external speaker was blown and crackled and the receiver of the phone made the person on the other end almost inaudible. We returned that one for another of the same model. The second phone came and the phone kept giving a warning that the screen was not an authorized part. The screen would at times be jumpy. We returned that one and ordered a third phone of the same model. It's been 4 days for that phone and so far so good. Hoping 3rd time is the charm. Have had good experiences with Gazelle in the past so hopefully this was just a fluke.

The phone I purchased was not able to activate.  I contacted customer support yesterday (Saturday) and still haven't heard anything.  Hopefully I will hear something soon and can get my money back.   It was advertised as an unlocked phone but when I called Verizon (the previous owners provider) he hinted it was locked and the reason I was not able to activate it.  Update, Gazelle did contact me with instructions on how to return my phone.  I did get a refund for my phone.

The phone's main speaker was so quiet that it was not functional as a phone without using speakerphone. I'm unsure how that could pass testing. The battery health was at exactly 80%, which seemed low for "good".On the bright side, the glass and case were in great shape for "good" rating, the price was great, and returning the unusable phone was easy.

Only complaint was my first call to customer service. I could barely hear what she was saying over all of the background noise coming from your office or her home if she was working remotely. And she couldn't seem to locate my account - maybe she was new?Other than that, everything else was good.

Item showed up in good condition. Shipping is much slower than Back Market. Was disappointed they did not include a charging brick in the box. Just the cable. There’s a reason Back Market is the best.

Review.Titre: Great place to get a phone, but the website needs work.
Review.Contenu: There's no other place I'd go to get a phone, and that's the truth. BUT, the website search functionality needs major work, and that contributes seriously to the customer experience. The filters just flat-out do not work. You can select that you want a phone in excellent condition that's in stock, and it returns results that are not that. It seems like it should be an easy fix to implement to make this a five-star experience all around.

Review.Titre: It was difficult to receive final functional approval.
Review.Contenu: It was difficult to receive final approval to make the phone function. Only when I went to online chat a second time overnight on the 2nd day did I receive the  notice that the phone was functional. Truly frustrating! It appears that someone did not do their job to make it work!It was not the phone, which is very good, but the process of registering it and completing all that was needed to make it acceptable with Tracfone. I’m happy with it now.
Unable to make purchaseWebsite Only allows PayPal purchases.Been trying all morning No ETA for fix.Completed purchase after working with customer service for 3 days and escalating to next level.

Review.Titre: Very un professional poor customer care…
Review.Contenu: Very un professional poor customer care services. Waiting time time is too long.After reach out first one cannot resolve issues,  forward to the supervisor who never receives call and disconnect the line.Poor experience 😢 But the Iphone13 there sent is awesome,  almost new.Better than my expectation. If they shows item available they shouldn't put it in back log and kill time.Hope other customers don't experience the same.Thanks again for the iPhone.

Review.Titre: Shipping was fast. Speaker didn't work.
Review.Contenu: Shipping was fast, phone looked in good condition for being FAIR.  I like Gazelle.  But guys, the handset upper speaker didn't work and it was pretty obvious with any call, Facetime, or playing any music or video.  This shouldn't have passed a 30 point inspection.  No big deal, I'm sending it back and I'll try another one, like your return policy, but if that one winds up being defective too, I really have to think about the next one after that.

Communication was poor. I was emailed that there was a shipping delay. When I called to find out what the issue was the line disconnected. I never got an email that it shipped, it just showed up in my email box. The phone is in better shape than I expected, but you guys could have done better with communication.

Review.Titre: Ordered an 11 pro max in excellent…
Review.Contenu: Ordered an 11 pro max in excellent condition and let’s just say it was no we’re near excellent. One inch scratch on the back of the phone, 3 corners are scuffed pretty good, the cameras had this weird black sticky stuff around them which I got off with alcohol and dirt in the speakers and charging port.

The iPad was in great shape and worked as expected. The charging cable that was supplied was the wrong one. It should have been a USB-C  customer service in the Philippines  said they would have the warehouse in Louisville (USA) send me the correct cable. They would contact me via email to provide a tracking number. I received nothing. So another call to the Philippines customer service and I asked to speak to a supervisor. He confirmed it was sent out and gave me a tracking number. I did receive it the next day

Product availability and website info.   It took me 2 hours and multiple visits of digging to finally find a combination of model, size and condition that was a fit.   Search results are misleading, showing phones available in all conditions when in reality they are not.Forward and back browsing needs to retain search settings with such a fluctuant inventory.   The phone itself is in good condition as advertised with no major flaws and overall very clean.   Prices are competitive with other refurbished vendors.

Review.Titre: I give it a 3 star because I order from…
Review.Contenu: I give it a 3 star because I order from gazelle thinking it was a great website and after reading reviews I'm starting to worry because I order my device on the 1st of January and it's the 5th and the order still hasn't been shipped at this rate if I don't get the device before January 8th I'm going to have to take action that probably going to put gazelle in a bad position but I'm keeping my hopes up hoping everything goes great and I calculated the shipping time and I should receive my device before the 8th or on the 8th so time will tell.

The MacBook Pro I ordered is fantastic! However, I ordered it on the 19th with 2-3 shipping and did not receive it until the 28th. No communication from the FedEx as to why the delay. All their website said was delay beyond their control. Turns out it was weather and I completely understand that, however they did not communicate this to me, nor did they answer my question when I called! So basically FedEx got my $30 and didn't deliver my product on time. I will order from Gazelle again only if they ship my next order with a different carrier.

Received the item today. It’s a gift I have not used the ipad yet. Your tracking system really sucks for a cCompany that everything else is first rate. As soon as UPS dropped off the package at USPS the tracking just stopped Really don’t like that , could influence another purchase.

Have bought from Gazelle before and have been satisfied, but this time the phone we received was very dirty. We had to clean dirt from around the camera and the edges of the phone. The phone worked as advertised but was to be given as a Christmas gift and we were disappointed.

Device arrived safely and in the status described by Gazelle. There was some adhesive left over on the device though. Device came with a Lightning cable instead of the USB-C that it needs to charge. No USB-C to USB-C cable either which has made migrating to the new device difficult. No device information or warranty information included in packaging.

Review.Titre: Amazing service but blown phone speaker
Review.Contenu: Hi I really liked the whole process and the phones looked amazing upon arrival. But, one of the phones I got an iPhone 13 Pro Max has a blown speaker. This was supposed to be a phone is good condition which means it functions 100% and this blown speaker is an issue.

Purchased an iPhone form this site. It was packaged in an tablet box and when I open the box, the iPhone was out of its plastic protective sleeve. It does look like the phone has been bouncing around inside the shipping box. Should do a better job with packaging.

Review.Titre: Ordering was fine, delivery went awry
Review.Contenu: Ordering was fine, but there was an issue with the delivery. I got a message that the order could not be delivered because the address was incorrect, so I had to have my partner go to the post office to deal with it. In the end after about 24 hours of fuss, the package was delivered anyways. The error claimed the address was wrong but obviously it was correct since it arrived in the end. Not sure why that happened but it was annoying to deal with.

Review.Titre: Gazelle it self was great shipping horrible
Review.Contenu: Gazelle it self was great, shipping on the other hand was horrible I paid for 2-3 day shipping got a notification saying it would be delivered on day 2 never came had to end up picking it up myself on day 4 from FedEx location so I would have it on timm
The quality of them "fair" product fell below the standard of my last purchase. The battery life also appears to be lower than that in my last purchase. VERY DISAPPOINTING.

Review.Titre: Almost two week delay between order and…
Review.Contenu: Almost two week delay between order and shipment even though my credit card charged on day of order.  Not satisfied with this.  Almost cancelled but have done  good business with you in past.  Item packaged well and in condition described.

Review.Titre: The iPhone device did not arrive in the…
Review.Contenu: The iPhone device did not arrive in the condition as described, it had an updated iOS firmware (16) which was different than advertised (15). I have now purchased 4 iPhone devices from Gazelle and none of them have arrived with the firmware as advertised in specifications. I have to return every time and hope for the next one :(

Your products are excellent. This is the second iPhone I’ve purchased from Gazelle. However, your customer service is awful. When calling, I was put on hold once for 3 hours before before someone answered. Another time on hold for 3 hours before giving up. 2 hours. 1 hour 30 minutes. Transferred to senior customer service rep for another 2 hour hold. Etc. Really need to up your game…

Initially I did not like the fact that i ordered an iPhone in excellent condition from GAZELLE and it turned out to be defective, but I feel the company responded well by giving me a refund and paying for the return shipping. It opened me up to considering another GAZELLE iPhone.  30 days have gone by since I picked up the 2nd iPhone 13 Pro Max and it's responding well.  I would consider buying another product from GAZELLE especially if you want to save a few bucks on a refurbished iPhone.  The first 6s Plus I bought lasted 7 years and still works.  I still recommend GAZELLE to all my friends and family.

Review.Titre: The iPhone arrived in very good shape…
Review.Contenu: The iPhone arrived in very good shape and it works well and looks great.  I ordered an iPhone 12 Pro to replace an iPhone 8+ that I got when they were the latest and greatest.  The only problem was that the post office delivered to the wrong address even though the address on the package was correct.

Review.Titre: Check battery life within first 30 days.
Review.Contenu: We ordered 3 iphone 12 pros in the excellent category. All the phones were in excellent cosmetic condition. As for battery life; 85%, 88%, and 100%. We did not set up our phones immediately so missed the 30 day return window as I would have returned the phones with less than 90% battery life. Took over 2 weeks to get an email reply and waited 35 minutes on hold to speak with customer service.Update 4/15: I did email Gazelle at the email they provided and have never received a reply.

Review.Titre: The phone itself seems as advertised so…
Review.Contenu: The phone itself seems as advertised so far but the customer service was awful. I had a question about my order. I called and sat on hold for 40 minutes before giving up. I submitted a form online with no response. Tried sending a FB message as well. Made a second phone attempt with the same result.

Transaction was easy and smooth and super fast shipping! Thanks!But the phone I received only had 86% of battery capacity (iphone). This is my second purchase, and the first one had 100%.This time was a disappointing result and I’m returning the phone, unfortunately.

Review.Titre: Phone I ordered was not actually in stock…
Review.Contenu: The first phone that I ordered apparently was not actually in stock even though the website showed it as available.  My order showed up as “unfulfilled” for three days. I called customer service and they told me that it was still within the 5 to 7 day shipping window, but when I complained (because that should not account for not having inventory… just ship time), the CSR escalated me up to a higher level of customer service.   That CSR was able to just substitute a different colored phone and it shipped the next day. I don’t know why you didn’t come back to me and just tell me that my phone was not available And offer me the different color, Because that would’ve been fine with me. Overall, it was frustrating. Traditionally I used swappa and only used gazelle hours because I wanted to experience it. Not sure I would use it again without thinking hard.

Review.Titre: On the website when making a selection…
Review.Contenu: On the website when making a selection by using filters the filter for condition doesn't seem to work and the display is wrong. all the phone say Fair, Good, excellent. but when you pick the phone sometimes it only has Fair, no good or excellent condition phones even as I clicked through the different color/memory/condition. I also tried changing filter to good and excellent only and it didnt seem to work.The product I received was in good/excellent condition I was happy with my purchase

Review.Titre: customer service needs to be improved
Review.Contenu: As a phone business, we order phones from Gazelle regularly. The quality of the phones are overall very good. However, getting a hold of the customer service is a pain.

The Note 20 Ultra I ordered and received was supposedly in "excellent" condition.  Immediately upon powering it up I could see screen burned in images on the background.  Not excellent at all in my opinion.  I promptly put it back in the box to send back for a refund.  At least the return process was smooth.

I ordered the phone on a Thursday, for 3-5 day delivery. Then received an email on Tuesday saying there was a delay on my order, but no reason stated at all. I had to call and speak with 2 different people to learn that the color I wanted was unavailable so I just swapped for a different color. I spent over 1hr on the phone. Fortunately the helpful customer service rep sorted me out and my phone arrived just in time. But the automated system was useless, if I had not called then the phone would have never arrived.

Review.Titre: I bought the Iphone 12 in excellent…
Review.Contenu: I bought the Iphone 12 in excellent condition, but the one arrived have fine scratches on its screen. But when we put the tempered glass on they disappeared, so we keep it anyway. But there won't be next time.

Paid with PayPal and never got an email from Gazelle other than this survey. I did check my spam folder. No order confirmation, order number or shipment notification. Product arrived fast and in promised condition.

Communication surrounding logistics of USPS delivery were lacking.  I was not instructed that the delivery was pending a signature acceptance.  This caused me to miss time at work to go to PO to pick up.  If I would have known in advance, could have planned for it better.

Review.Titre: First phone sent was locked to FedEx…
Review.Contenu: First phone sent was locked to FedEx Corporation, had to buy another and pay $20 more for same phone.

Review.Titre: You can't beat the price I paid
Review.Contenu: You can't beat the price I paid for my iPad Pro, and it was in stellar condition and even partially charged! There were a couple of cons: the email list they had me sign up for to get $20 off was misleading and apparently for my *next* purchase. So that was... Unpleasant. Also the the shipping was not trackable even through Shop or the usps code. It never generated shipping updates... So, while chaotic, a good deal. I will also add I'm still considering Gazelle for purchasing an upgrade on my phone in a few months.

Phone came in okay condition. Usually my phones come without scuffs. This was the most expensive phone I have purchased, which was why I was slightly disappointed. My wife and I have probably bought 5-7 phones from here. All great experiences. The battery health on this phone was great though!

The service was definitely fast! Ordered an older iPhone in fair for my son. Didn’t expect much. Cosmetically it was in great shape. Unfortunately, right out of the box the battery needed to be replaced.

Average service and support. Nothing stands out as exemplary. I only chose Gazelle because they had the item I was looking for. Unfortunately I wanted a “green” case iPhone, but only “gold” was available when I was ready to order.

second time buying from gazelle. the phones look great and are working fine so far. my only complaint is that i did not receive an email update when my order was shipped. i called customer service and they helped me out but gave two tracking numbers when there was only one valid number. im happy with the purchase if the phones don't turn out to be duds in a few weeks.

Review.Titre: my iphone xr came in good condition but…
Review.Contenu: my iphone xr came in good condition but did come with only 84 perfecnt capacity and went down to 83 in the course of 2 weeks

Review.Titre: My score would actually be in between a…
Review.Contenu: My score would actually be in between a 3 and a 4. Overall I had a good experience. I think I received a good phone. They did not send the correct charging cord. I bought a Samsung Galaxy and got an iPhone charger.

Review.Titre: I ordered red but got burgundy
Review.Contenu: I ordered a red Samsung S22 Ultra. I got a burgundy Samsung S22 Ultra. At first, I thought it was the light here where I'm at. I tried other lighting environments, but was never able to faithfully see "red" as seen on some Samsung images. It was more purplish, matching the burgundy images I had seen elsewhere. I thought about keeping it, but then remembered on earlier searches that the burgundy phones had a lower price point. I was hoping to get this done before my summer vacation later this month, in about a week's time, which is why I went with Gazelle - I thought there wouldn't be an issue with the phone. That is, if I went elsewhere (for slightly less), I may not be able to get any issues resolved. So, there's that as a saving grace. But still ... I'm bummed about not transferring and setting the replacement phone before gong on a travel adventrue.

Our service was okay, not great. Our phone was supposed to ship in 2 days because we paid for expedited shipping. We ordered it on a Thursday. On Monday when I called, I was initially told it would ship on Wednesday, and we would receive it on Friday. After a lengthy conversation and a few holds, they finally shipped it, and we received it on Wednesday.I also was dumbfounded that we received no adapter with the phone. I thought we should at least get the adapter to be able to charge the phone.

Review.Titre: Main reason for the 3 stars is this I…condition of device
Review.Contenu: Main reason for the 3 stars is this I pad was sold in “Excellent” condition I would say it’s “good” at best 3” scratch across the screen all 4 corners have bumps or scuffs an the back has sticker residue left on it.

Dec 5, 2023: I'm updating this review from 1-star to 3-stars after customer service reach out to me after I posted my below review. We came to a compromise that made me about 80% satisfied, so I went with it. They purchased the phone from me for $564, which is still less than the original, but to save from the hassle of trying to deal with buyers on FbMarketplace or eBay, I accepted their compromise. Original post: Gazelle has predatory practices. I had an offer for $641 for my iPhone 13 Pro, and before I mailed it to them, I took at least 10 picture of the phone from all angles so that there couldn’t be any dispute about its condition – zero scratches/smudges.  When I bought the phone it went straight from the box and into a case and never left it. So I shipped them the phone, and they dropped their offer down to $396. That is an insane $245 drop! I immediately declined that laughable “offer”, and requested that they send my phone back, and it better be exactly in the same condition as it was when I sent it to them. I feel extremely preyed upon by this experience, and I will NEVER do business with them again or recommend them. The practice of getting a person to relinquish their phone, all for them to bait and switch dramatically on the price should put them out of business.  Let’s just say for the sake of argument that they considered the phone slightly lower quality than I do, the next level down for offer was around $615.Even though the company replied, I wouldn't consider doing business with them at all. Even if there was a minor discrepancy based on differences of opinion, in no reality is a $245 deduction warranted. Like I said, I took man pics of my phone at all angles before shipping it. I'm sure you all get away with this with a lot of people, but I am not one of them. I don't appreciate having my time wasted.

Review.Titre: I had to return an iphone 13 to Gazelle…
Review.Contenu: I had to return an iphone 13 to Gazelle earlier this year that was sent to me with a corrupted ios system that I wasted hours attempting to address before I returned it. I had purchased that phone using multiple discounts, and I wanted to carry over those discounts to a new purchase. I reached out to customer service in multiple ways, multiple times and never received any response. Eventually, I bought another phone, but not the one I really wanted. I purchase an iphone 11 Pro instead after deciding I would give Gazelle one more chance. Luckily this one was in perfect condition and I am happy as a result. Gazelle gets three stars though, for not carrying over the $20 sign up discount and not upgrading a 15% off sale to the 20% off of my original purchase. A few years back, I received excellent service from Gazelle but not this time.

Review.Titre: well i bought the phone for a couple of reasons but mainly to download music and use it in my car
Review.Contenu: well i bought the phone for a couple of reasons. one is to listen to music through the phone on my car stereo. well for some reason when i try to bluetooth the phone to my car stereo it wont pick up the car bluetooth name i guess you would call it. i see on my other phone what the name is but it never comes up on my phone i got from you guys. also no sound comes out of the phone which is wierd. if i plug in earphones i do hear music. so i wasnt sure if the two coincide with each other. the phone itself i do like even though it seems tiny compared to my other phone but oh well. maybe someone can help me on this matter. it would be greatly appreciated of so. thank you gazelle and this why i gave you 3*otherwise it would have been 5

Review.Titre: The first phone I ordered was broken…
Review.Contenu: The first phone I ordered was broken and the screen was coming off. It would power on and off within minutes. I returned that phone and ordered a second. This time, it was perfect except that the battery was only operating at 77%…I now have to get a new battery despite the phone being marked as “excellent”

Review.Titre: The installed battery was not an Apple…
Review.Contenu: The installed battery was not an Apple certified product so the iPhone keeps telling me that there is a hardware battery problem. The Battery Health app also won't work.

Review.Titre: My product was not shipped in a timely…
Review.Contenu: My product was not shipped in a timely manner and i may not get it before i leave for a vacation. worse then that they didn't tell me of the shipping problem until the day it was shipped. i finally called and talked to someone who told me my product had been shipped. i got the email out the slow shipping and the email saying it had been shipped on the same day. Customer service is also a problem because you have to wait on hold for hours before hyou can talk to anyone.

Review.Titre: Expedited delivery delayed but still charged
Review.Contenu: I ordered two phones separately, both going to the same address. I contacted customer service to see if I could combine the orders right after placing the second (an hour after the first was placed) but they said it was not possible (so I paid double for shipping). I selected expedited delivery (2-3 business days for both phones). The first arrived on time, the second I received notice of delay. I messaged customer service through the portal and told them if the phone was not going to arrived within the 3 day window to send the phone via normal shipping or refund the expedited service cost. I also said they could just cancel the order if the phone was not available for some reason. The next day I received a second notification that my order was shipping. I sent a follow-up stating that I no longer needed expedited service (as the phone was going to arrive after my departure for a trip) and their would be no one at the house to sign for the delivery. I received no follow up on either message sent through the help portal and have not received a refund for the expedited delivery that arrived in an un-expedited time frame.

I ordered two phones separately, both going to the same address. I contacted customer service to see if I could combine the orders right after placing the second (an hour after the first was placed) but they said it was not possible (so I paid double for shipping). I selected expedited delivery (2-3 business days for both phones). The first arrived on time, the second I received notice of delay. I messaged customer service through the portal and told them if the phone was not going to arrived within the 3 day window to send the phone via normal shipping or refund the expedited service cost. I also said they could just cancel the order if the phone was not available for some reason. The next day I received a second notification that my order was shipping. I sent a follow-up stating that I no longer needed expedited service (as the phone was going to arrive after my departure for a trip) and their would be no one at the house to sign for the delivery. I received no follow up on either message sent through the help portal and have not received a refund for the expedited delivery that arrived in an un-expedited time frame.

Review.Titre: The phone was fined so far
Review.Contenu: The phone was fined so far. My rating is not about the phone but the inactivity regarding already two emails regarding the lack of the charging item for the phone/ All that came with phone was the cable. If this is something new and you do not include it I was not aware of it and did not read it anywhere. I have sent to emails asking about it and have not heard anythin g back yet

Review.Titre: A required signature was not obtained.
Review.Contenu: FedEx delivery was to have someone sign for the phone. No one signed. The phone sat in 110 degree heat for hours. Poor delivery of an expensive device. Was not Gazelle’s fault. I put a complaint in to FedEx.

Review.Titre: I paid extra for express shipping and I…
Review.Contenu: I paid extra for express shipping and I didn't get the package yet! I think it should be refunded. I will be receiving the package on Monday just as I would have with regular shipping.

I'm really disappointed because the screen proctor is peel8ng away from the screen and it's also upsetting that Noone informed me nor even stated about it peeling up and away from the screen.239.236.6695 So I would like someone to contact me on acct.of this messed up screen proctor.
The battery on the iphone is "significantly degraded'.  I expected to have a better quality product.  Is there any way you can provide a new battery to make this phone meet my expectations?

Review.Titre: Sold me a phone you did not have?
Review.Contenu: Once I Recieved my phone. All seems well. However you 1st  sold me a phone you did not have. That’s Not professional!My order was the last iPhone 12 mini  ( or any 12) in good or better grade. After several days;  I got the notice it was back ordered. FYI: you sell “used” “refurbished” phones. No such thing as a back order?????  I called & said I’d take one in any color. You were unable to process such a request. That left me with calling back the moment an iphone 12 mini of any color popped up & telling YOUR company you now had one in another color. Thus. You don’t get high marks.

Review.Titre: Hit and miss on getting a good phone.
Review.Contenu: I've ordered about 6 phones now, out of the 6 one was reported stolen and another the battery was not good.That's a 33% failure rate on keeping customers happy.

Review.Titre: Nice phone, but not great battery
Review.Contenu: The phone itself was in really good shape. However, I would expect a better battery charge if I am paying for an excellent level device.

The phone came to me in excellent condition and I am super happy with it. But they put the wrong power cable in. Instead of AUS B to USB C they put a Apple iPhone lightning cord.  I emailed customer service and have not heard anything back. Prompt responses mean a lot....

Review.Titre: I ordered a phone and was offered $10…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a phone and was offered $10 off with a promo code.  Because my billing address and delivery address were different they canceled my order.  I didn't realize the order had been canceled until 2 days later.  I called customer service who advised I would need to repurchase the same phone. Nowhere does it say that you have to have the same billing and shipping address. So I did as she said and when I went to enter the promo code it said it had already been used.  I called back to see what I needed to do to be able to use the code.  She said it looked ok on her end. I explained that I had tried over and over and it wasn't working.  She eventually transferred me to a supervisor who told me they couldn't do anything. I spent a total of 42 minutes on the phone for them to tell me there is nothing they can do.

I've ordered iPhones before from Gazelle and haven't had any problems. This time, my iPhone 12 Pro came and appeared to be in very good condition. The transfer of data from my old phone was easy. But a few hours later, the volume on calls began malfunctioning. I called Gazelle and they were very helpful and said I could return the phone at no charge. But still . . . for $577 phone in "good" condition, I would have expected to not have such a problem.

First phone didn’t work. Ordered second phone and then told order was delayed. Told there was nothing that could be done but to wait. Tried to talk to supervisor to get help but only allowed to put in ticket.  No one called back after 48 hours. So called again and level 2 support finally expedited a phone.

Review.Titre: Buying inexpensive can be expensive - but Gazelle may make this right.
Review.Contenu: Buying inexpensive can be expensive - I bought my husband an iphone SE 2nd generation in last half of Sept. He is a very "light user" by any estimate. However, by this January, his battery no longer held a charge and would deplete overnight. The battery health field in "Settings" shows that the battery has a maximum capacity of only 83%! I wish I had checked this when we received the phone and believe it was probably low then. I called Gazelle, which said tough luck because we are outside the 30 day return window. I called Apple, which advised that the battery should be replaced once maximum capacity falls to 82%.  So while we got a great price from Gazelle, we now have to pay for a new battery, making our inexpensive purchase expensive. I had recommended Gazelle to a friend but would no longer do so and would not use them again.UPDATE:  Gazelle contacted me with an offer to refund the phone even though the 30-day window has expired.  I thanked them but advised that we already had paid for a new battery (at a cost of roughly $80) after they refused to accept the return. I offered to send the receipt if they would consider reimbursement. So at least Gazelle deserves credit for their outreach.  Waiting for a reply.

Review.Titre: The phone was not checked out well…
Review.Contenu: The phone was not checked out well enough.  I've purchased several phones from gazelle and now I'm not sure.

Review.Titre: Had a problem getting the order…
Review.Contenu: Had a problem getting the order confirmed because of mailing address, Gazelle wanted a physical address. Phone was shipped by UPS then transferred to USPS in Tulsa without a P.O. Box number. Almost did not get the phone, Post Office had it in a return to sender basket... Order was filled and shipped in a timely manner, good price from Gazelle..

Stands by product. When phone wouldn’t work, they immediately authorized and paid for the return shipping. Battery health is important to Gazelle, my phone showed up with 100% health which told me they replaced the battery due to the original being too degraded. The problem with the first phone could have been resolved by a few steps. But, directed return instead. Could put a bit more effort in troubleshooting prior to defaulting to return.
Ordered Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra (Verizon). Phone arrived 1.5 weeks later. It works great. Received very less money for trade-in.

First time visiting the Gazelle website/online shop and I was nervous about purchasing something. After some research, I decided to try them out. I was not disappointed as the product I ordered was exactly like the description.

We ordered during the Thanksgiving/Black Friday timeframe.  Two days after ordering, we were notified that there was a problem shipping our order. (I suspect the real issue was too many orders with too little product on hand). However, the phone shipped the next week, looks good, works well and meets our expectations of good products coming from Gazelle. (we are a multi-time purchaser).
The phone I purchased was supposed to be in excellent condition but it arrived with 3 deep scratches in the corners.  The screen is fine and it works but I was expecting something in better shape.

4* out of five because of delivery.  Phone is outstanding in appearance and performance. Shipping by USPS is sub standard. Extremely slow and almost impossible to query status. I received shipped status and two intermediate stop notifications but that was it until delivery three days after the USPS projected delivery date.

The phone arrived in good time, was packaged well and the phone itself really looked new! The only downside is that the battery max is 84% and we will need to purchase a new battery before long. But for the price, this was an excellent experience and I would not hesitate to use Gazelle again.

Review.Titre: The phone received was in better condition than expected!
Review.Contenu: The phone received was in better condition than they had rated it.In fact, it was kind of shocking as it was marked as 'fair' while only having a couple notable scratches on the top right corner of the screen with no other evidence of use.

Review.Titre: Great way to buy a reconditioned phone
Review.Contenu: Very good experience purchasing a reconditioned phone. I got the exact one I was looking for. It works as promised. Not a scratch on it, rated fair condition but I would’ve said good or excellent. Delivery was a little slower than expected, but all in all a great experience.

The phones I purchased were in excellent condition, in my opinion.  I had ordered “fair”.  Battery health of one phone was 100% and the other was 93%.  I ordered on November 20th and the phones were delivered on December 4th. (Two weeks)

Review.Titre: Good, but add battery health status!
Review.Contenu: Gazelle has always been good, shipping has always been prompt, products were reasonably priced, and condition was as advertised. The reason for a 4 rather than 5 star rating this time is that I'd really like to know the battery health % of a device before I buy it. With Apple being so very repair-unfriendly these days, you really want to know how good the battery is.

Review.Titre: Keep an eye on stock during high demand, Great prices and turnaround
Review.Contenu: The shopping experience was pretty darn good. I did have to wait until after cyber Monday deals to end for stock to return. Everyday prices on Gazelle are good anyway, and I think the price I eventually paid outside of Cyber Week was extremely fair.I was able to eventually nab the phone I wanted with a little extra effort. I noticed the stock alerts too late 2-3 times. Stock was probably moving quickly because of the holidays. My phone arrived quickly with accurate tracking. The phone did have some very minor issues out of the box (speakers covered in lint, old iOS installed), but I found them easy to address myself. Gazelle put support info in the box in case I needed it. I later found I lucked out and my phone still had an active AppleCare+ subscription.I feel really good about shopping with Gazelle in the future and have already recommended it to a friend.
Good prices, especially the extra 20% off for Black Friday.Enabled me to get newer tech that I wouldn’t normally be able to afford.

Order came quickly and in Iphone SE2 was in perfect condition. Like brand new. Not a scratch or mark on it. Only complaint is the impossibility of getting ahold of the company except through email (never found a phone number) which was never responded to. I actually tried to cancel this order because originally it was going to take too long to deliver. Luckily it came quickly and all good. Overall, product was in excellent condition but you could have a problem if you ever needed to get ahold of them. Based on the outstanding condition of the phone, I would buy from them again.

Outstanding quality of the phone ... like brand new. Shipping could've been faster. Most importantly, your contradictory policy on the teacher/first responder discount where you say the discount can be applied in conjunction with any other offer. Unfortunately, I did not receive the discount despite going to the trouble of registering and providing documentation to your third-party verifier and my attempt to get customer service to remedy the matter. Please clean up that language on your website.

Review.Titre: Battery Health was only 82% on what is…
Review.Contenu: Battery Health was only 82% on what is supposed to be an "excellent" condition phone.  I know the condition is cosmetic, but 82% is awful close to the 80% cut off. There is a small scuff to the back glass that is also questionable for an "excellent" grade phone, but it was on sale, shipped quickly and the front glass is perfect. Not thrilled, but not completely unhappy either.

Review.Titre: Got a iPad for a good price for the…
Review.Contenu: Got a iPad for a good price for the holidays . The 25% everything in there on line store made the deal even better 👍🙏❤️. Definitely will be looking at Gazelle again when I need either another iPhone , iPad or a MacBook

Review.Titre: They were very helpful at the chat.
Review.Contenu: They were very helpful at the chat.Also I got my product, an iPhone 12 fair condition but really looked like brand new, is working well so far and I’m happy with my purchase. Also was easy to transfer my chip and Info.
The product could have been delivered a bit faster, but it was delivered as promised, so I am satisfied.  The product was as described and was a good deal.

Review.Titre: Good value with Black Friday discount.
Review.Contenu: The iPhone 12 was in excellent condition cosmetically and functionally as advertised. Shipping was quick. However the battery was rated by Gazelle on the enclosed packing slip as having 82% capacity. I find that barely acceptable on a device graded excellent. Otherwise I have no complaints.

Review.Titre: There was a delay in shipping my phone
Review.Contenu: There was a delay in shipping my phone, other than that I am enjoying my phone.

Shipping was fast, received the phone within a week. Cosmetically, the phone was perfect. No scratches or marks and I ordered the “Good” option. Giving it 4 stars due to the battery life. Phone battery max capacity was at 90% and dropped to 89% after everything was transferred/set up. I would consider this battery life as poor.

Review.Titre: Great device, but incorrect cord supplied.
Review.Contenu: Device was shipped quickly and came in excellent shape. The cable included for the device did not work with it and there was no easy way to reach out to customer support on their site.

Review.Titre: Waiting more than a few days for it to…
Review.Contenu: Waiting more than a few days for it to arrive =Minus one star. Met expectations otherwise.Will do business with you again.

Review.Titre: Great experience for the most part
Review.Contenu: Great experience for the most part. Device came in quickly and was mostly as expected. Checkout was easy.

Review.Titre: The company refunded my money and I was…refund
Review.Contenu: The company refunded my money and I was pleased with this. Good service

Review.Titre: Great fair prices and quality Got 2…
Review.Contenu: Great fair prices and quality Got 2 iPhone SE 2020 64 GB model for $158 for T mobile . I was leasing 3 iPhones for $74 a month . It’s a huge savings for me in the future and a slight upgrade from the iPhone 8 we were currently using the last few years

Ordered IPhone 11 good condition for daughter that has smashed 2 other phones. That phone came in near perfect condition with fast shipping. Very pleased, it’s only been a week. So far it’s great, thanks. I’ll definitely be back.
Phone arrived promptly. Battery life not as long as I expected,

Review.Titre: Gazelle will always be # 1!!!  The shipping was fast and even though I…
Review.Contenu: The shipping was fast and even though I ordered a fair condition phone. I couldn’t see any marks or scratches on it!! My husband is over the moon about his phone.

Review.Titre: Good price!! Easy website! Chat not so much
Review.Contenu: The item I needed was clearly located and I received the correct item. The item, an iPad, was easy to set up. The reason I took off a star was the chat experience was frustrating. The tech apologized in each text and I did not get a good response. My concern was regarding a trade in. The website indicated Giselle would accept devices that would not turn on. The tech said they didn’t and then said they did take them. I gave up with trying to do a trade in and just ordered one straight out. Very good price!!

Review.Titre: I am happy with my new phone, but...
Review.Contenu: I am very happy with the phone that I bought, and satisfied with the delivery time (right on schedule), but a little unhappy with what appeared to me to be a bit of bait and switch ads for the phone.  The only price listed in the sales page was that for a phone in fair condition.  When I looked at phones in better condition the price was significantly higher.
Straightforward website was easy to find what I was looking for. The phone arrived on time and in beautiful shape and working order. Good deal!

Review.Titre: Overall I am impressed with the…
Review.Contenu: Overall I am impressed with the condition of the phone.  The only disappointing thing is that battery life is at 77%.  Thought this might have been something that is dealt with in the refurbishing phase.

Great phone! Ordered a fair but had to tilt the back screen in the light to see the very minimal scratches. Battery at 87% capacity when received. Very good deal for a new-ish phone in great condition!

Review.Titre: 2nd purchase to fix the first purchase…
Review.Contenu: 2nd purchase to fix the first purchase they made things right. But took two phone calls

The purchasing platform is very straightforward and we found the model we wanted and ordered it within 5 minutes.There was a delay for the original color selected but we were able to switch it out for another fairly painlessly after a phone call.

Review.Titre: The S23 I bought was in excellent…
Review.Contenu: The S23 I bought was in excellent condition. It came with an Apple cable, though, so that doesn't work with the phone I bought. I already had several USB-C cables, so it didn't really make a difference in my case, but it did seem like an oversight that would be easy to avoid.

Review.Titre: Received order far sooner than expected…
Review.Contenu: Received order far sooner than expected even using regular shipping. Pleasantly surprised. Only glitch, is it could be considered such, is that I did not expect screen border to be white. I would have preferred black, but not crucial. Either I missed that in description, or it wasn't clearly indicated. Now all I need to have done is data transferred from old device which for some reason, seems to be a problem.

The phone is great! In good condition. I left a star off because they aren’t aware what phone they are sending since they sent the wrong cord. Unfortunately I don’t have any c cords so I’ll have to order. Otherwise smooth transaction
So far so good. A quick phone shipment and product was received as marketed. Great value too. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Phone appears to be in good condition
Review.Contenu: Phone appears to be in good condition. Will have to see how it functions and how the battery life proves to be until I am sure it is a good purchase. Delivery of the phone through USPS was not ideal as there seems to be less concern in getting time sensitive deliveries into a recipients hand when sent through that service.

Processing was quick, delivery prompt. I do wish it was more apparent on WHICH form of delivery is selected. This order used FedEx. I would have chosen USPS, or UPS, as I am unavailable for signature. This caused an inconvenience for me of having to go TO FedEx to get the pkg. The product seemed to be as advertised, no complaint here.
2-3 day expedited delivery is misleading.  It is 2-3 days from when you ship and it took 2 days to ship.

Product was perfectly working and in amazing condition. I read someone else’s review saying their tracking number was FedEx and not USPS when the confirmation email said USPS and I came across the same issue. Just making sure that the email says the correct mailing service would be perfect. Other than that, everything was in great condition

The iPad was in excellent condition as advertised; however, a charger was not sent as advertised. After calling and reporting this to them, the wrong charger was sent. I called back and am supposed to have another sent. I hope the right one is sent as the iPad Pro was bought for my husband to replace an iPad2, and he was skeptical about the whole process.

Review.Titre: Phone worked great, packaging was questionable
Review.Contenu: The packaging was not as great as I would've liked it to be–it came in a small cardboard box and the phone itself was in a ziplock bag with two pieces of foam on both sides. The phone was a bit dirty as well, with lots of smudges and dust on the screen. However, it worked perfectly well and had 100% battery capacity, so I'm pleased with it overall.

Overall great experience. Gazelle is a little slow to process the order and get it out the door (2 days promised). They did meet that goal, so no worries. Advice...plan accordingly if your order is needed by a certain day. The device I bought was packaged well, arrived on time, and in the condition as advertised, so well done Gazelle!

I've purchased from Gazelle before. This iPad arrived in a timely manner. The condition of the iPad was near perfect. I've already set it up and it's running properly. Only one hitch. The charging cable that was sent with it was a regular USB to Lightning cable instead of a USB-C to USB-C cable. The 4th generation iPad Air has a USB-C port instead of a lightning port. Other than that I'm pleased.

Great product in excellent condition. The only issue I had was the inability to adjust shipping schedule with the carrier. FedEx was not able to change deliver dates due to Gazelle's rules but it ended up working out OK. Overall, totally recommend Gazelle! I've bought at least 5 phones from them over the years and they've all been good products.

Review.Titre: Good product and deal, bad packaging
Review.Contenu: I bought a 4th gen iPad Pro 12.9 with 1TB of RAM, in "good" condition for a very fair price. It arrived very quickly, and the condition was actually better than just good. The reason why I don't give the experience a 5-star is because packaging was terrible. The big iPad could very easily have gotten damaged.

The shipping speed was excellent. I was happy it shipped same-day. The iphone arrived in excellent condition. I'm somewhat disappointed it came with a third party charger cord. I was also unable to access the coverage plan through the link Warranty Life provided. It led to an error page after which I contacted them. I haven't received a reply other than to let me know they received my request.

Review.Titre: Using USPS for delivery has its issues…
Review.Contenu: Using USPS for delivery has its issues in that the Postal Carrier will not deliver/leave the phone in a postal locker. FEDEX or UPS might be a better choice.

Review.Titre: Happy with delivery, unhappy with communication
Review.Contenu: I was very happy with the speedy delivery.  I was very unhappy with the lack of communication.  I called the customer service number and was on hold for 93 minutes.  I sent two emails to the customer support address and did not receive a reply until 4 days after the item was delivered.

Review.Titre: Select Excellent or transactions will fail
Review.Contenu: After much review, we selected a fair quality product, this created a scenario where our purchase was cancelled for a "fraudulent" item. Again we tried but this time with a good quality product. Again our selection was flagged and cancelled for "fraudulent". What we finally came up with talking to Gazelle, was items under the Excellent quality have this happen a higher frequency. Our final product was above expectation, unfortunately, we wasted time with the lower priced items. Just tell us upfront how to purchase.

First buy on gazelle and was a little skeptical, but just got the phone. Everything looks in order, condition looks good, and battery seems to be holding up well, although this is only day two. Shipping wasn’t bad either.  I would buy again.-Update- 3/10/23 - just a couple weeks in and I Phone ended up having problems.  Most apps won’t load, even after restarting and deleting apps and reinstalling with even restarting again.  No additional recommended trouble shooting worked.  Requested refund and so far I’ve gotten the return slip.  Keeping 4 stars as long as transaction goes as expected. Will update again with resolution.

Phone ordered came quickly.Suggestion for future -- let customers know in packaging how many battery cycles have been used. I presume most if not all phones sold come with somewhat used battery.You could learn this data and put it in packaging by using coconut-battery.com to obtain it.

Review.Titre: I received the phone a little early…
Review.Contenu: I received the phone a little early which was excellent and the phone was in very good condition so I am very pleased with this business and the product! will definitely be buying from again!

Easy to use. Wide range of products and options offered. Competitive pricing. Very fast delivery. Product was exactly as described and instructions for how to set up my new phone were provided. I do wish there was a pin provided by gazelle for the purpose of ejecting the SIM card port on my new phone (I had to dig through my own old products to find one). There was a billing issue that I addressed via the Contact Us page of Gazelle. While the issue was cleared up relatively quickly, I did not receive any confirmation from Gazelle that A) my message was received and would be looked at, and B) that the issue was corrected ie charges reversed on my credit card. I was only aware that the problem was solved by self-monitoring my own bank account. I don’t even know if Gazelle had anything to do with correcting the issue or if my bank noticed the irregularity and corrected the problem on their end.
The iPhone 12 is in excellent condition. I wish I had been advised before purchase that I’d need to buy a new SIM card but that transaction worked out well at a Verizon store.

Overall experience was good. I got my money within 4-5 days when they received the device. Process is very smooth.But on final page when you sell they say "When we inspect your device, if it's in better condition than you thought, we'll increase your offer!". I sent them a brand new device in original box with all accessories but they still paid what they originally quoted.

Update: I wanted to come back for an update here. While the initial shipping was not great, the device is in advertised condition and seems to be working without a hitch. So, I bumped the review to 4 stars. Not sure I would order again but with the device being as advertised I am a bit more likely that’s for sure!Original: Well, the order didn’t ship on time it was delayed. Then when they did ship it (not too long after but still) they didn’t upgrade shipping for it so I still actually haven’t even gotten the item yet. I ordered it with the intent of it being a gift and haven’t gotten it in time. As far as business days I think I will get it by day 7 but I think they could have done better. I don’t know what shape the phone will be in when I get it but hopefully it is as good as advertised. Honestly though I don’t think I’ll order again. Not thrilled with how they went about shipping and the delay.

Review.Titre: I’m very pleased with the iPhone 13 Pro…
Review.Contenu: I’m very pleased with the iPhone 13 Pro Max I purchased. It is in the excellent condition that I paid for, the only reason I don’t give 5 stars is because of the lack of updates on the order status. My order went from unfulfilled to being accepted at USPS. I received my order in 5 days total, which is as advertised, thank you for delivering as promised!

Review.Titre: The ordered item was shipped superfast…
Review.Contenu: The ordered item was shipped superfast - so that's the good.  Unfortunately it did not work as well as I am used having Gazelle items work - long time customer.Customer service was wonderful helping arrange return but it seemed to take a long time after it was received at Gazelle facility for the refund to occur.  Other than that...I like Gazelle

I ordered a “fair” iPhone 12pro max and the quality of the screen and body is absolutely amazing. Looks brand new, NO SCRATCHES. I shipped expedited and it came in exactly three days so the shipping was on point. The one reason I’m saying four stars instead of 5 is because the battery life on this phone is 78%. That’s kind of low and was hoping for at least 85% battery health. Battery’s are like 90 bucks replaced at apple so I’m not to worried about it seeing as the condition is great otherwise.

Review.Titre: I am extremely satisfied with my purchase
Review.Contenu: I am extremely satisfied with the purchase of my pre-owned I-phone 14 plus. This is the third I-phone in purchase from gazelle and so fair I’ve never experienced any issues with the phone. I originally wanted a new I-phone for my teen but it was too expensive, so I decided to gamble on a pre owned i-phone. Well, the quality and price of a pre owned I-phone from gazelle was so amazing that my wife returned her new I-phone purchased directly from Apple.
The shipping is three business days after the order is accepted after one business day. The package is a cardboard box, but the phone is not well-protected since it moved around in the box.

Review.Titre: sold gazelle my ipad and they gave me the right estimated price.
Review.Contenu: ok so, i sold them my ipad air 5th generation icloud unlocked everything unlocked free everything no scratches no cracks basically new their offer was 354! which is not bad since i paid 499.99 and i got to keep my apple pencil which i can easily sell. but the process was easy just need patience, i havent receieved my payment but the people over the phone was nice and i should recieve it in 2-5 days i rate a 4/5 star bc i havent recieved my payment. but im excited to use gazelle again. people wrote bad reviews on it but theyre geniune and im happy with the service.

Quick, good packaging, but I ordered a Green phone and they sent me a Black one.  Since I'm just going to put a case on it anyway I don't really care that much, but I have to subtract a star for inaccurate order fulfillment.

I have purchased 4 iphone 13 pro in total. 3 of them came as described. i was ok with edge, back, or light screen scratches.  one came with heavy scratches on the screen. i have returned the lower than good quality, but now the prices offered before are no longer available. slightly disappointed but will order again due to simple return process

Review.Titre: The phones you receive are generally in…
Review.Contenu: The phones you receive are generally in excellent condition. But we usually buy 2 and pick the better battery life or cleanest out of them, or inevitably one is still showing as unable to be unlocked or linked to someone’s account. Prices are unbeatable and my recent shipment was sent extremely quickly.

I’ve purchased several refurbished devices from Gazelle and the experience is always good. I had a great experience ordering a new-to-me phone from Gazelle. I ordered a phone in “good”condition, but when it arrived it looked great! The phone was better than I expected, which was a nice surprise. The only reason I’m giving them 4 stars is for the odd communication around my order. After being told it was on the way, I got another message saying it was backordered. I was going to cancel my order, but it shipped two days later. All in all the turnaround was less than a week. So, speedy delivery, and the product looks great and seems to work flawlessly. The delivery came usps, signature required, and arrived a day earlier than promised, which meant a trip to the post office to pick it up, but better than leaving it out to potentially get stolen. Bottom line: I would definitely purchase from Gazelle again, and have already recommended it to a couple of friends. Thanks Gazelle, for giving us a more sustainable way to purchase electronics!

I chose to sell my iPhone 14 to Gazelle because they offered me the best price and because I'd experienced great customer service from them in the past. I accepted their offer and received notice from the USPS that a package was on its way to me but received no notification from Gazelle. 3 days after the offer I received a prepaid shipping box for my phone but no notification from Gazelle. I called customer service and they verified the offer and that I could send the phone to them in the box provided. I received no notification once they received my phone so I called them. They verified receipt of my phone and I was told someone would contact me once my phone had been evaluated. After waiting 5-7 business days and receiving no contact, I called once again and was told a check had been mailed to me. I asked the amount of the check and was given a figure $15 above the initial quoted price. Two days after my call I actually received the check which was as I was told, $15 above my accepted offer!Very, very poor communication but Gazelle exceeded my quoted/accepted initial offer. From accepted offer to receipt of my check was around 16 days.

When I called to speak with someone about this in customer service the person I spoke with was very friendly and immediately made things right for me. They emailed me a return label. I was told it takes about 5 to 7 days to receive a refund. When the money is refunded I will purchase another phone through Gazelle. Excellent customer service.
